Method Detail

mapWithSmartPermutations

public final void mapWithSmartPermutations(int numpermutations,
                                           int cutoff)
Maps disease loci. Only performs permutations until num cutoff are found that have mapping score exceeding that for the true case control configuration. Set cutoff equal to numpermutations to peform all permutations.

Parameters:
numpermutations - The maximum number of permtuations to perform.
cutoff - How many acceptances before stopping.
